snippet: The altercation happened just three days after lifeguards were attacked at the pool, which reopened on Thursday after being closed for 28 years.
abstract: Police officer is punched in the face and another officer's arm is injured in an altercation with swimmers at the newly reopened McCarren Pool in Brooklyn; incident occurs three days after a raucous crowd attacked lifeguards there.
lead_paragraph: The altercation happened just three days after lifeguards were attacked at the pool, which reopened on Thursday after being closed for 28 years.

headline.seo: Officer Punched by Swimmer at McCarren Pool in Brooklyn
